products.name: HI-VIS REF Jacket
products.description1: Stay protected and visible on job sites with this high-visibility, water-resistant safety jacket. Ideal for construction, roadside assistance, and industrial environments.
bullets: ANSI/ISEA 107 Class 3 compliant for maximum visibility
High-contrast fluorescent yellow with reflective striping
Water and wind resistant outer shell
Front zip closure with storm flap
Inner thermal lining for cold weather protection
Multiple utility pockets for storage
Elastic cuffs and waist for secure fit
Reinforced stitching for durability
products.description2: Engineered for the toughest conditions, this safety jacket ensures visibility in low-light and high-risk environments. Designed with reflective taping and bright neon fabric, it enhances worker safety while maintaining comfort. The thermal inner lining keeps you warm during cold shifts, while the durable construction stands up to daily wear on demanding job sites.
materialCare: Outer Material: 100% Polyester with PU coating
Inner Lining: Quilted polyester thermal insulation
Machine wash cold with like colors

products.name: HI-VIS REF Jacket
products.description1: This high-visibility work jacket ensures safety in low-light and hazardous conditions, combining comfort and durability for industrial and outdoor environments.
bullets: Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2020 Class 3 compliance
Durable polyester outer shell with water-resistant coating
Reflective tape across chest, shoulders, arms, and back
Black bottom design to conceal dirt and grime
Zip-up front with secure collar and inner lining
Multiple pockets for tool and utility storage
Elastic cuffs and waistband for snug fit
Ideal for construction, road work, and warehouses
products.description2: Stay safe and visible with our Hi-Vis Reflective Safety Work Jacket. Designed for professionals working in risky or low-visibility conditions, this jacket combines functionality, protection, and style.
dimensions: Available Sizes: M, L, XL, XXL

products.name: HI-VIS REF Coverall
products.description1: Stay protected and visible in hazardous environments with this high-visibility orange coverall. Designed for safety and comfort, it features reflective striping for maximum visibility and a durable build for rugged use.
bullets: Bright orange color for high visibility
Reflective stripes on chest, back, arms, and legs
Full-body protection with secure front closure
Adjustable cuffs with Velcro fasteners
Multiple utility pockets including arm and cargo
Durable fabric ideal for industrial use
Ergonomic design for comfortable fit
Complies with high-visibility safety standards
products.description2: This safety coverall is engineered for professionals in construction, road work, emergency services, and industrial environments. With its enhanced visibility and utility features, it ensures both compliance and confidence on the job.
materialCare: Machine wash cold with similar colors
Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: HI-VIS REF Shirt
products.description1: Durable and functional two-tone safety work shirt designed for visibility and comfort in industrial environments.
bullets: Two-tone high-visibility orange and navy design
Reflective tape for enhanced night visibility
Button-front closure with flap chest pockets
Breathable cotton fabric for all-day comfort
Long sleeves with adjustable cuffs
Meets ANSI/ISEA visibility standards
Double-stitched seams for added durability
Ideal for construction, roadwork, and utility jobs
products.description2: Stay seen and stay safe with our high-visibility reflective work shirt, crafted for tough environments where visibility is critical. With dual-tone styling and reflective tape, this shirt ensures both safety and a professional look.
materialCare: Machine wash cold with like colors
Wash inside out to preserve color

products.name: Alumi Heat-RES Suit
products.description1: Heavy-duty aluminized suit designed to protect industrial workers from extreme heat, radiant energy, and molten splash exposure.
bullets: Reflective aluminized outer shell for high heat resistance
Full body coverage including hood, gloves, and boot covers
Heat-insulating inner layers for extended protection
Clear face shield integrated into hood for visibility and safety
Adjustable fit for ease of movement and comfort
Ideal for foundries, metalwork, and firefighting environments
Tested to meet EN and NFPA standards
Durable stitching and reinforced seams for longevity
products.description2: Engineered for maximum thermal protection, this aluminized suit is essential for professionals exposed to high-temperature environments. With its reflective surface and insulating layers, it offers reliable defense against radiant heat and molten splash.
materialCare: Do not machine wash – spot clean with damp cloth
Avoid using harsh detergents or bleach
Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight
Do not iron or tumble dry
Inspect before each use for wear and tear
Ensure all closures are secured before use

products.name: HI-VIS Flame-RES Coverall
products.description1: This high-visibility flame-resistant coverall is designed for maximum safety and comfort in industrial environments. With bright orange color and reflective strips, it ensures visibility and protection in low-light and hazardous conditions.
bullets: Made from durable flame-resistant cotton fabric
Reflective tape on shoulders, arms, and legs for enhanced visibility
Two chest pockets with flap closure
Elasticated waistband for better fit and flexibility
Full front concealed zipper for easy wear
Pen pocket on left sleeve
Ideal for oil & gas, marine, and construction industries
Complies with international safety standards
products.description2: Engineered for professionals working in high-risk environments, this coverall combines safety features with functional design. The breathable fabric and ergonomic fit provide all-day comfort without compromising on safety.
materialCare: Machine wash cold with like colors
Avoid fabric softeners to maintain flame resistance
Store in a dry, well-ventilated area
Inspect regularly for damage or wear
dimensions: Available Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL
Color: Safety Orange with Reflective Strips

products.name: Medical Scrub Set
products.description1: This professional medical scrub set includes a comfortable V-neck top and drawstring pants, designed for healthcare workers who need functionality and all-day comfort. Ideal for clinics, hospitals, and care centers.
bullets: Soft, breathable polyester-cotton blend
Short-sleeve V-neck top with a flattering fit
Two spacious front pockets for easy storage
Drawstring waistband for adjustable comfort
Durable stitching for long-lasting wear
Customizable with clinic logo embroidery
Easy to wash and quick to dry
Ideal for doctors, nurses, and medical staff
products.description2: Built for performance and comfort, this scrub set delivers a clean, professional look while offering the flexibility and features healthcare professionals need during long shifts. The lightweight fabric is perfect for long hours of use.
materialCare: Machine wash warm with similar colors
dimensions: Available Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL
Color: Medical Blue with customizable logo
